content.title: Attain Well-being in This World and the Hereafter
content.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَافِيَةَ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالآخِرَةِ
content.translation: O Allah, I ask You for well-being in this world and the Hereafter.
content.description: Ye dua padhne se Allah duniya aur akhirat dono mein sukoon deta hai...

content.title: Ramadan Coming Soon!
content.description: Tayyari shuru kar dein. Sirf 30 din bache hain.
